Body:
Description: Dear Sir or Madam,
the backend Security Updates can not be installed via Endpoint Management Console anymore. Last Security Updates were installed last december.
Missing Updates can be searched but not be installed.
These Updates are not blocked by our firewall - we already have checked this.

We need your support please.

Kind regards.
i.A. Carsten Briesemann

What We've Learned Updated: 24.04
- customer is unable to install the backend updates
- since they are hosted on prem, I asked for their availability to apply the updates from the backend

Next Steps Updated: 24.04
- waiting on customer's availability

What We've Learned Updated: 24.04
- customer is unable to install the backend updates
- since they are hosted on prem, I asked for their availability to apply the updates from the backend

25.04
- the boot partition was full
- after clearing it, the security patches were successfully applied
